about_the_game: A unique 2D pixel art platformer where satisfying pounding mechanics and mind teasing puzzles meet. Step into the shoes of Homam, a skilled protagonist with a powerful fist, as he embarks on a quest to assist the legendary inventor Al-Jazari. In a world where time travel and ancient mysteries intertwine. Solve intricate puzzles and conquer challenges using your wits and agility. This game offers a refreshing experience with its focus on exploration and brain-teasing puzzles. Join Homam on a journey through history and innovation, where every level brings new discoveries and adventures!
